definition: black devil (derogatory term for black or African person)
abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]
ghost/demon/terrible/damnable/clever/sly/crafty/(suffix for sb with a certain vice or addiction etc)/one of the 28 constellations

sentences.english: "Nigga" is frequently heard in gangsta rap songs.
sentences.chinese: “黑鬼”是黑帮歌曲中频繁使用的一个词。

sentences.english: Do I look black to you?
sentences.chinese: 我在你看来，就那么像黑鬼么？

sentences.english: The white devil is worse than the black.
sentences.chinese: 伪装的坏人比黑鬼更可怕。

sentences.english: Most Oni dress in tighter skins and wield huge swords.
sentences.chinese: 黑鬼长有硬皮，挥舞巨大的刀剑。

sentences.english: I'm going to skin that nigger alive, " he said quietly."
sentences.chinese: “我要去活剥那个黑鬼的皮，”他低声说。

sentences.english: "You yellow-blooded nigger, " Arch said rushing at him.
sentences.chinese: “你这个胆小的黑鬼，”阿奇说，一边朝他冲过去。

sentences.english: Don't play dumb , nigger. You know who this is. You got my money?
sentences.chinese: 别装傻黑鬼你知道我是谁你拿到钱了吗？

sentences.english: The blacks are still niggers, but nobody says so.
sentences.chinese: 黑人依旧是黑鬼，但没有人再这样说。

sentences.english: Man, bitches come and go, every nigga pimpin know.
sentences.chinese: 嘿哥们，那些婊子来了，每个黑鬼都知道。

sentences.english: Born and raised, Shady P nigga.
My niggers on the corner still selling cocaine.
sentences.chinese: 我的黑鬼的角落还卖可卡因。

sentences.english: Just blaze that shit up nigga, yeah, 'sup Snoop??
sentences.chinese: 只是狗屎黑鬼，是的，支持监听。
“黑鬼”是“非洲裔美国人”的粗直语说法。

sentences.english: Wiggers are a problem in the United States as well.
sentences.chinese: 黑鬼也是美国的一个问题。

sentences.english: He himself has said that his maternal grandmother used the “n-” word from time to time.
sentences.chinese: 他自己跟他姥姥经常用黑鬼那个单词。

definition: sex fiend/molester/sex attacker/sex demon (a spirit that enters people's souls and makes them desire sex)
little demon (term of endearment for a child)/mischievous child/imp
leech/bloodsucking vermin/vampire (translated European notion)/fig. cruel exploiter, esp. a capitalist exploiting the workers
(derog.) old but still alive/old fart/old bastard
